statements: SELECT * FROM public_infrastructure_projects
SELECT project_name, location FROM public_infrastructure_projects ORDER BY project_name ASC
SELECT project_id, project_name, location FROM public_infrastructure_projects WHERE location = 'City A'
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM public_infrastructure_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT project_id, project_name, location FROM public_infrastructure_projects ORDER BY project_id DESC
SELECT project_name, location FROM public_infrastructure_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM public_infrastructure_projects WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM public_infrastructure_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, location FROM public_infrastructure_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM public_infrastructure_projects ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_infrastructure_projects WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM public_infrastructure_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_infrastructure_projects WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM public_infrastructure_projects WHERE start_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT log_id, log_date, log_description FROM project_logs ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_manager FROM public_infrastructure_projects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_manager FROM public_infrastructure_projects WHERE end_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_manager FROM public_infrastructure_projects WHERE project_manager LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, project_id, log_date, log_description FROM project_logs WHERE project_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001';
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, project_type FROM Projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM Projects LEFT JOIN ProjectTasks ON Projects.project_id = ProjectTasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT task_name, due_date, status FROM ProjectTasks WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM Projects WHERE project_type = 'Software Development';
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM Projects WHERE project_type = 'Research' AND end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE project_type = 'Research' AND end_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT manager_name, email, phone_number FROM ProjectManagers WHERE manager_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT location_name, address, city, state, country FROM locations;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_status, progress_date FROM tasks JOIN progress ON tasks.task_id = progress.task_id;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'ongoing';
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_status FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY task_status DESC;

SELECT p.project_name, t.task_name, pr.progress_date, pr.percentage_complete FROM projects p INNER JOIN tasks t ON p.project_id = t.project_id INNER JOIN progress pr ON t.task_id = pr.task_id WHERE p.project_status = 'completed' ORDER BY pr.progress_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE project_id = '87fe0c25-6824-447b-9466-30337306f2af';
SELECT project_name, location FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM projects JOIN budget ON projects.project_id = budget.project_id;
SELECT material_name, quantity, supplier FROM materials ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT material_name, quantity, supplier FROM materials WHERE project_id = '1ae6bf7e-3be4-4d70-890a-b0c5e2e44895' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, status FROM tasks WHERE project_id = '1f1a2636-9b0b-4690-b9e7-ded28620f0b1' AND status = 'In Progress'
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, location FROM projects WHERE project_id = '1ae6bf7e-3be4-4d70-890a-b0c5e2e44895'
SELECT project_name, total_budget, spent_budget FROM budget ORDER BY spent_budget DESC
